metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26575 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In Wireshark through 3.2.7, the Facebook Zero Protocol (aka FBZERO)dissector could enter an infinite loop. This was addressed inepan/dissectors/packet-fbzero.c by correcting the implementation of offsetadvancement.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
